UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Effects of Rationally Designed Physico-Chemical Variants of the Peptide PuroA on Biocidal Activity towards Bacterial and Mammalian Cells.
Literature.Author: Shagaghi N, Clayton AHA, Aguilar M-I, Lee T-H, Palombo EA, Bhave M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Sheep erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=<500 µg/ml,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:IC50=>250 µg/ml
